name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC

owner.name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC (Owner)

address: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC, 2188 No 5 Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 2T1

featured_reviews.review_id:
If you are looking for a CHANGE or NEED someone to give you motivation to work out, BLK Box gym is where you should head to right now.

Friendly staff, clean and well organized gym with lots of equipments

I have been trained by many personal trainers in my life but after meeting Ken, my new personal trainer, I have realized not all the trainers are the same. He really puts in effort and care towards his clients, very well organized, uses his experience and knowledge to help his clients reach their goals. Any trainers can push you to work out and do cardios, but Ken actually makes perfect work out/diet plans for each individual

Highly recommended 10/10

featured_reviews.review_id: I joined BLK box gym because I wanted to lose some weight for my graduation ceremony. My experience has been nothing but great. Everyone at the gym was kind and helpful especially my lovely trainer, Rachel. Rachel was tough at times, I used to call her evil, and very caring and attentive on the days I was feeling down. I enjoyed training with Rachel, I enjoyed the music she used to play for my sessions and I was very happy with the transformation I saw on my body after only 2 months of training. Also, I appreciate how Rachel was very understanding of my busy schedule and how she used to push me to keep coming to the sessions regularly. I am very happy with the results I achieved in the 6 months of training with Rachel and I would've continued working with her if I didn't have to move out of town. All the best Rachel :)
featured_reviews.review_text: I joined BLK box gym because I wanted to lose some weight for my graduation ceremony. My experience has been nothing but great. Everyone at the gym was kind and helpful especially my lovely trainer, Rachel. Rachel was tough at times, I used to call her evil, and very caring and attentive on the days I was feeling down. I enjoyed training with Rachel, I enjoyed the music she used to play for my sessions and I was very happy with the transformation I saw on my body after only 2 months of training. Also, I appreciate how Rachel was very understanding of my busy schedule and how she used to push me to keep coming to the sessions regularly. I am very happy with the results I achieved in the 6 months of training with Rachel and I would've continued working with her if I didn't have to move out of town. All the best Rachel :)
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Fatima,
Thank you for your kind review! We're really happy to hear how Rachel made an impact in your fitness lifestyle :)

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been training with David for a few months and he changed my body in just 1 month. I was stunned to see how far I had come in such little time. I have known David for several years and his energy is infectious. I dealt with bloating, hypothyroidism and iron deficiency while doing shift work which all lead to a decline in my health. I went from almost 130lbs of "skinny fat" to 114lbs of muscle. He has helped me obtain the physique I've always wanted and the strength I never knew that I had. He's incredibly attentive, knowledgeable, and an overall genuine trainer and boxing coach.  His positive attitude and approachable nature makes me feel completely at ease. I cannot recommend David enough as he truly knows what he is doing and you will see how he genuinely cares about your goals. He radiates passion and dedication for his clients and I absolutely love training with him. He will make you succeed with your fitness goals. If you're seeking a trainer who will produce results and make you enjoy it at the same time - you have found the right place. My only regret is not starting with him sooner. I am so incredibly happy - Thank you David and the amazing Blk Box Team

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been working with Dave Rojo for personal training sessions since March and can't say enough positive things about the experience. He's always motivating and brings a super fun energy to each session (along with a furry friend, Obie, who is a ray of sunshine). I feel stronger than ever and it's great to be able to just show up and have an entire workout planned for you, along with the encouragement to push yourself.
featured_reviews.review_text: I've been working with Dave Rojo for personal training sessions since March and can't say enough positive things about the experience. He's always motivating and brings a super fun energy to each session (along with a furry friend, Obie, who is a ray of sunshine). featured_reviews.review_id:
I've been training at BLK BOX for 5 months now. Initially I came because I was experiencing back pain and in general was not happy with my body and mindset (COVID greatly affected me). I was reeeally nervous because I had never trained in the gym before and avoided physical exertion in every possible way 
It's been five months - I've never felt like skipping a workout. My PT Preston is incredibly professional, knowledgeable and supportive. Going to train with him and seeing the rest of the team is always the highlight of my day. I feel so much better both physically and mentally. Can't recommend this place enough!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ecstatic to hear you enjoy training with Preston, Sofia! Really proud of your hard work and discipline in the last 5 months -- keep killing it!

featured_reviews.review_id: Just completed 36 personal training sessions with Ken, he is very kind, patient, and professional! I'm happy that Ken helped me develop a healthier life style! Every staff is friendly! If you are looking for personalized training plan, BLK is definitely a great choice.
featured_reviews.review_text: Just completed 36 personal training sessions with Ken, he is very kind, patient, and professional! I'm happy that Ken helped me develop a healthier life style! Every staff is friendly! If you are looking for personalized training plan, BLK is definitely a great choice.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We're happy you had a blast training with Ken, Mavis! Thank you for your kind words, we're glad that you're satisfied with your time at BLK BOX GYM.

featured_reviews.review_id: The slogan "weight lost" is exaggerated in most places but if you're looking for real results then you need to go to Blk Box. I trained for two years prior to Blk Box at commercial gyms and I noticed little chances to my body. The tailored program at Blk Box actually made a difference and I could see how my body changed every single week; not to mention what a pleasure it was to work with Ken. He's extremely knowledgeable you can ask him anything training related and he would be able to answer you. He even helped me recovered from an old injury that prevented me from doing many of the movements. Every single trainer at the gym is friendly and has his/her own personality that you can fell in love with. His rate is also very reasonable comparing to other personal trainers. I'm excited to see how Blk Box continues to grow!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Allen! Thank you for leaving your kind review for us. We're really happy that you had a great time working with Ken.

featured_reviews.review_id: Rachel is my personal trainer and is fantastic. Very easy to talk to, pushing me even when I want to give up and flexible with my crazy schedule. So happy with my results so far and will definitely be continuing with her in the future!

Hi Kyo,
Thank you for sharing your kind words! We're happy that Rachel helped you with the results that you wanted!
